channel.title: Adding Music In-Game ( Delta )
channel.description:
Hello all, Just a quick question could anyone point me in the direction of how to add music/sound effects in game.
- Thanks

item.title: Adding Music In-Game ( Delta )
item.dc:creator: @IsolatioN IsolatioN
item.description:
@IsolatioN wrote:

The 317 client doesn’t come with a built in sound system so you’ll have to find the tutorial Galkon released to add sounds client sided. You’ll have to rename the variables back to bluurr’s client. And server side you’ll need a method for streaming music and sounds.

Read full topic
